data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Terossi, Mariana, Cuesta, Jose A., Wehrtmann, Ingo S., Mantelatto, Fernando L. (2010): Revision of the larval morphology (Zoea I) of the family Hippolytidae (Decapoda, Caridea), with a description of the first stage of the shrimp Hippolyte obliquimanus Dana, 1852. Zootaxa 2624: 49-66, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.198176
